com.google.android.glass.TMM

Class TMMService

  • java.lang.Object
    • Service
      • com.google.android.glass.TMM.TMMService

  • public class TMMService
extends Service
    Service owning the LiveCard living in the timeline. The card contains a tooltip explaining to the user how to activate the raminder of the app.
